title: AddToAny Share Buttons
shortDescription: Share your content with floating & inline share buttons.
longDescription: AddToAny provides share buttons to help people share your content to any service, such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Tumblr, Reddit, email, SMS and over 100 more sharing and social media sites & apps. ### Floating Share Buttons * Floating share bars stay in place as you scroll. * Vertical buttons are great for desktop. * Horizontal buttons are great for mobile. ### Inline Share Buttons * Share buttons inline with content. * Universal share menu fits on all displays. * SVG icons are pixel-perfect at any size. ### Custom Sharing * Show official share counts from supported services. * Add, remove, or rearrange your share icons. * Share the current URL, or a specific URL. * Get sharing stats in Google Analytics. ### Custom Styles * Change the background color of buttons. * Change the foreground color of buttons. * Change the size of buttons. * Change the space between buttons. ### Custom Placement * Align share buttons left, right, or center. * Place share buttons anywhere on a page. * Hide the vertical share bar on mobile. * Hide the horizontal share bar on desktop. AddToAny is the universal sharing platform used by millions of websites, making sites social media ready since 2006.
instructions: Customize and install AddToAny on your site.
author: AddToAny

categories.title: Recommended for Blogs
categories.description: Apps for blogs in the recommendation engine.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

shareTitle.description: Leave blank to share the current page's title. Some services will use the page's meta tags instead.

proposedApp.title: AddToAny Buttons
proposedApp.shortDescription: Share buttons to share and save anywhere.
proposedApp.longDescription: AddToAny provides share buttons to help people share your content to any service, such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Tumblr, Reddit, email, SMS and over 100 more sharing and social media sites & apps. ### Share Buttons * AddToAny SVG icons are super-lightweight and pixel-perfect at any size. * Universal share menu fits on all displays. * Automatic Google Analytics integration (access guide) for sharing analytics. ### Custom Styles * Change the background color of buttons. * Change the foreground color of buttons. * Change the size of buttons. ### Custom Placement * Place share buttons anywhere on a page. * Align share buttons left, right, or center. ### Custom Sharing * Share icons can be added, removed, or rearranged. * Share the current URL, or a specific URL. AddToAny is the universal sharing platform used by millions of websites, making sites social media ready since 2006.
proposedApp.author: AddToAny

versions.releaseNotes:
New: AddToAny Floating Share Buttons!
A floating vertical share bar for desktop.
A floating horizontal share bar for mobile.
Choose whether to hide each bar on desktop/mobile.
Place your floating buttons on the left or right side.
Center your horizontal share bar.
Adjust the space from the edge.

New: Adjust the roundness of icons.
New: Adjust the space between buttons.
